name: Gaslamp Media
tagline: San Diego based web, print, and video start here.
description:
Gaslamp Media is a full-service marketing and graphic design firm specializing in dynamic print and electronic communications with an urban edge.
Located in the heart of downtown San Diego's Gaslamp District, we create cutting-edge marketing solutions designed to meet and exceed our clients' objectives. Our expertise includes identity and branding, logo design, advertising, website design and development, and marketing campaigns collateral materials, and special projects.
